item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "The truth is that nobody is owed an apology for anything. Apologies are lovely when they happen. But they change nothing. They do not reverse actions or correct damage. They are merely nice to hear." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Denis Waitley
item.description: "Mistakes are painful when they happen, but years later a collection of mistakes is what is called experience." -- Denis Waitley

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Jimmy Stewart
item.description: "Fear is an insidious and deadly thing. It can warp judgment, freeze reflexes, breed mistakes. Worse, it's contagious." -- Jimmy Stewart

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Kimon Nicolaides
item.description: "The sooner you make your first five thousand mistakes the sooner you will be able to correct them." -- Kimon Nicolaides

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Hyman G. Rickover
item.description: "You have to learn from the mistakes of others. You won't live long enough to make them all yourself." -- Hyman G. Rickover

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Calvin : There's no problem so awful, that you can't add some guilt to it and make it even worse." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I hate feelings. Why does sobriety have to come with feelings?" -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Courtenay add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I like flaws and feel more comfortable around people who have them. I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs
